unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Try again later or contact support.
reset_link_expired: The password could not be reset. Probably the reset link from your email has expired.
password_saved: Your new password has been saved.
close_window: You can now close this window.
confirm_email_success: Thank you for confirming your email address!
confirm_email_failed: Your email address could not be confirmed. Probably the link from your email has expired.
invalid_credentials: The email address or password is incorrect.
account_inactive: Your account is no longer active.
account_blocked: Your account is temporarily blocked because you entered a wrong password too many times. Try again later.
password_too_short: The password must be at least 6 characters
no_repeat_password_match: The passwords are not the same
create_account_email_exists: A user with this email address already exists
email_address_pending_verification_1: You have changed your email address and a confirmation mail was sent to your new address:
email_address_pending_verification_2: The change will only become active after you have confirmed the new address.
no_repeat_new_password_match: The new passwords are not the same
mfa_intro: Secure your account with extra verification through your phone.
mfatype_intro: Select the verification method. You can also add multiple methods, so that one can function as a recovery in case you are locked out from another method.
mfatype_totp_explanation: Use an authenticator app such as Google or Microsoft Authenticator, 2FAS or Authy. This is the most secure option. We will not need your phone number. But if you lose your authenticator app, you will be locked out from your account.
mfatype_sms_explanation: Receive a code through SMS. This is the easiest option and you will not be locked out from your account as long as you have access to your phone number. But this means that we need to know your phone number.
mfa_add_totp_install_authenticator: Install an authenticator app on your phone. We suggest Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, 2FAS or Authy.
mfa_add_totp_scan_qr: In your authenticator app, scan the following QR code.
mfa_add_totp_enter_code: Then enter the code that you see here.
mfa_error_type_totp_max:
You have already added verification with an authenticator app.
If you want to use another authenticator app, you can just scan the same QR code in your new app. Open the existing verification to see the QR code again.
Alternatively, you can delete the current verification and then add a new one.
mfa_error_type_sms_max:
You cannot add more phone numbers for SMS verification.
If you want to use another number, you should first delete one of the existing numbers.
mfa_error_sms_already_exists: You have already added SMS verification with this phone number.
mfa_error_add_max: You have reached the maximum number of attempts to add a verification method. You can try it again later.
mfa_error_verify_max: You have reached the maximum number of attempts to verify a code. You can try it again later.
start_download_empty: You are not a member of a project where you can download data.
